languages.text: "Тот день, когда я впервые увидел{mf||а} тебя, я сохраню в памяти навсегда. Ты сама открыла мне новый мир".
"I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."
languages.original_text: "Тот день, когда я впервые увидел{mf||а} тебя, я сохраню в памяти навсегда. Ты сама открыла мне новый мир".

traits.locale_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened a new world to me."
"I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened a new world to me."
"I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a whole new world to me."
"I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a whole new world to me."
"I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."
"I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."

languages.text: «Siempre atesoraré el recuerdo del día en que te vi por primera vez. Tú también me has abierto un nuevo mundo».
languages.original_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre atesoraré el recuerdo del día en que te vi por primera vez. Tú también me has abierto un nuevo mundo».

languages.text: 「お前を始めてみた日の記憶を、永遠に大事にしよう。お前も私に新たな世界を見せてくれたのだから」
languages.original_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を始めてみた日の記憶を、永遠に大事にしよう。お前も私に新たな世界を見せてくれたのだから」

languages.text: “我会永远珍视第一次见到你的记忆，你也同样带我来到了新的世界。”
languages.original_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."

traits.locale_text: “我会永远珍视第一次见到你的记忆，你也同样带我来到了新的世界。”

languages.text: "Ich werde die Erinnerung an den Tag, an dem ich Euch zum ersten Mal sah, immer schätzen. Auch Ihr habt mir eine neue Welt eröffnet."
languages.original_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Erinnerung an den Tag, an dem ich Euch zum ersten Mal sah, immer schätzen. Auch Ihr habt mir eine neue Welt eröffnet."

languages.text: « Je chérirai toujours le souvenir du jour où je vous ai vue pour la toute première fois. Vous aussi, vous m'avez ouvert les portes d'un monde nouveau. »
languages.original_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je chérirai toujours le souvenir du jour où je vous ai vue pour la toute première fois. Vous aussi, vous m'avez ouvert les portes d'un monde nouveau. »

languages.text: "Gözlerimin seni ilk gördüğü anı sonsuza dek en kıymetli hazinem gibi saklayacağım. Sen de bana yeni bir dünyanın kapılarını açtın."
languages.original_text: "I will forever treasure the memory of the day I first saw you. You too have opened up a new world to me."
